comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do not edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: decay
description: Decay a numeric, spatial or date type value based on the distance of it to an origin.

params.name: value
params.description: Value to calculate decayed value for.

params.name: origin
params.description: Central point from which the distances are calculated.

params.name: scale
params.description: Distance from the origin where the function returns the decay value.

params.name: offset
params.description: Distance from the origin where no decay occurs.

params.name: decay
params.description: Multiplier value returned at the scale distance from the origin.

params.name: type
params.description: Function to use: linear, exponential or gaussian decay.
